title: Muslim board to explore ways to overturn SC alimony verdict
selftext: The board asserted that it doesn’t augur well “with human reasoning that the man is held responsible to maintain his ex-wives when the marriage itself is non-existent”.
comments: Hi Scary_Asparagus_6890, your submission has been removed as /r/India limits users to 6 submissions in 24 hours.
